mapper.update:
update si_material
material_no = #{materialNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
material_type = #{materialType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
material_name = #{materialName,jdbcType=CHAR},
material_level = #{materialLevel,jdbcType=CHAR},
material_model = #{materialModel,jdbcType=CHAR},
measure_unit_id = #{measureUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
package_volume = #{packageVolume,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
material_desc = #{materialDesc,jdbcType=CHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where material_id = #{materialId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update si_material set material_no = #{materialNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, material_type = #{materialType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, material_name = #{materialName,jdbcType=CHAR}, material_level = #{materialLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, material_model = #{materialModel,jdbcType=CHAR}, measure_unit_id = #{measureUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, package_volume = #{packageVolume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, material_desc = #{materialDesc,jdbcType=CHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT} where material_id = #{materialId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from si_material where material_no = #{materialNo, jdbcType=CHAR} and material_name = #{materialName, jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into si_material ( material_no, material_type, material_name,material_model, measure_unit_id, material_desc, user_id, create_time, dr) values
( #{po.materialNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.materialType,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{po.materialName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.materialModel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.measureUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{po.materialDesc,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{po.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{po.dr,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.sql: m.material_id, m.material_no, m.material_type, m.material_type_id, m.humidity_level_id, m.material_level_id, m.measure_unit_id, m.material_version_id, m.produce_loss_level_id, m.life_cycle_state_id, m.material_name, m.delivery_days, m.moq, m.material_model, m.material_draw, m.supplier_id, m.material_desc, m.test_type, m.user_id, m.create_time, m.update_time, m.dr, mt.material_type_name, hl.humidity_level_name, ml.material_level_name, mu.measure_unit_name, mv.material_version_name, pll.produce_loss_level_name, lcs.life_cycle_state_name, s.supplier_name
mapper.select: select , ms.material_specification_id, ms.file_name, ms.file_path from si_material m left join dd_material_type mt on m.material_type_id = mt.material_type_id left join dd_humidity_level hl on m.humidity_level_id = hl.humidity_level_id left join dd_material_level ml on m.material_level_id = ml.material_level_id left join dd_measure_unit mu on m.measure_unit_id = mu.measure_unit_id left join dd_material_version mv on m.material_version_id = mv.material_version_id left join dd_produce_loss_level pll on m.produce_loss_level_id = pll.produce_loss_level_id left join dd_life_cycle_state lcs on m.life_cycle_state_id = lcs.life_cycle_state_id left join si_supplier s on m.supplier_id = s.supplier_id left join si_material_specification ms on m.material_id = ms.material_id where m.dr = 1 and m.material_id = #{mid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
